Welcome to Day 3 of the thrilling AFFiNE 0.11.0 launch week! Today, we're delving into the core of game-changing features that will improve how you enhance your pages:


* Effortlessly **change font colours** to elevate your text in page mode.


* Experience the strength of **a powerful database that supports drag-and-drop, keyword search, filtered grouping, and column hiding**.


* **Historical records** assist you in retracing your editing path.


* **The table of contents** seamlessly applies to **both page and edgeless modes**.


Let's explore a world of possibilities for crafting and organizing knowledge, kicking off a whole new digital adventure!


# Colour Your Text: A Palette of Options for Expressive Content


Not satisfied with just highlighting text? Now, you have the freedom to **change the font colour of your text**! Seamlessly enhance your content by choosing between **background highlights or font colours**—it's your choice!

# Advanced Database Functionalities: Streamlining Data Management


### 1. Keyword Search Within Databases


Our database tool now boasts an advanced **keyword search** functionality. This feature enables users to swiftly locate specific entries or information within the database, accessing your data has never been this easy before.


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>
  <source src="/blobs/oOFFIeM-uZ-CzAhwktHt2qqek1KO-6zzA_gOFl-q7So=" type="video/mp4" />
</video>


### 2. Intuitive Drag-and-Drop Line Reordering


Enhancing the user experience, the database now allows for effortless reordering of entries. The intuitive drag-and-drop feature provides a seamless way to **organize and prioritize database lines**, making data management more **user-friendly and flexible**.


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>
  <source src="/blobs/EE1oOG_Wiwnp9zpALgdULlMzy-9qE3pWxxc7YhU5pPs=" type="video/mp4" />
</video>


### 3. Properties Control: Visibility Management


The new 'Properties' feature in our database tool introduces an innovative way to control the **visibility of different columns**. Users can now customize their database views by choosing which columns are visible, allowing for a more streamlined and personalized data-handling experience.


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>
  <source src="/blobs/3fMdP45c3wbseUH5olAQVhvuOWrZzp-pt-gC6xBnozI=" type="video/mp4" />
</video>


### 4. Field-based Filtering


Our database tool has been further enhanced with a 'filter' function. This allows users to filter data based on specific fields, enabling more **targeted and efficient data retrieval**. This feature is particularly useful for managing large datasets and focusing on relevant data subsets.


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>
  <source src="/blobs/NjBfwiakvAxykoY-F5a0SfcZIXQlOP2hv67aNaQCHc0=" type="video/mp4" />
</video>


### 5. Reorganization and Regrouping of Databases


A significant addition to our database functionalities is the ability to reorganize and regroup data. This feature provides users with the **flexibility to rearrange their databases** according to **changing needs and preferences**, offering **a higher level of customization** in data management.


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>

# Time Travel with AFFiNE Cloud: Enhanced History Tracking


Your local-first experience with AFFiNE is now strengthened with the help of AFFiNE Cloud, which will now back up history and snapshots of your documents. Delve effortlessly into the past with our **history tracking** feature, **exclusive to the cloud -** effortlessly roll back to earlier versions of your work with just a click. Collaborate fearlessly, as every change by your team is transparently recorded, ensuring that no idea gets lost in the shuffle.

# Effortless Navigation within AFFiNE's Dynamic Table of Content


Get ready for the most requested outline view – it's finally here! Introducing a brand-new outline Table of Contents (TOC) that offers a seamless overview of your content hierarchy. Navigate with ease and efficiency! Achievable in both Page mode and edgeless mode!


### 1. TOC in Page Mode


Worried about getting lost in the intricate structure of a lengthy article? In the page mode's t**able of contents view**, your crafted titles will **neatly align**, effortlessly showcasing the **intricate structure and logical layout** of your article with just a single click!


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>
  <source src="/blobs/1C0-6jSNNrhTKqFNcwpQYpM6pM_AmnL_WH9qpe840dE=" type="video/mp4" />
</video>


### 2. TOC in Edgeless Mode


Picture a whiteboard with its very own table of contents! Simply choose your display content in edgeless mode, click the right sidebar, and presto! **Your frames elegantly materialize in the borderless catalogue view, providing a clearer and more visible overview of your whiteboard content at a glance!**
